sub_title: IB Regional Manager | IB Examiner | Verification Visitor
summary:
A life-long learner with the passion to teach!

* Currently the Regional Manager for Pakistan, Iran, and the Nordic region at International Baccalaureate (IB) Global Centre, the Hague
* Member of the IB Education Network (IBEN) -  IB Team Visitor, IB Examiner, IB Course Outline Reader, IB Unannounced Examination Visitor, Workshop Leader, Programme Leader
* 25+ years of experience teaching and mentoring students and teachers in private and international schools in Syria, Indonesia, United Kingdom, Pakistan, United States and China; 5+ years of experience teaching Business and Management in IB World Schools
* Served as the Head of IB Diploma Programme, leading and strategizing the IB authorization process 
* IB Certified Examiner of Business and Management, Administrator (Completed Cat. 1 Administrator IB training in Singapore), Business and Management Teacher (Completed Cat. 2 IB training of Business and Management in China)
* 5+ years of experience working on various projects in the World Bank and multinational companies
* 43 education projects managed and monitored for Lifelong Learning Division of Birmingham City Council, England, building partnerships with various voluntary organizations, private and public schools, and government authorities
* Financial monitoring and budgeting experience for various educational institutions in Jakarta, Islamabad, and Damascus
